original_title: The Greatest, Terrible Book Ever Made - The Story too Disturbing to be a Movie: Blood Meridian
overview: Blood Meridian, or The Evening Redness in the West analysis and read-through by wendigoon
tagline: He never sleeps, the judge. He is dancing, dancing. He says that he will never die.
title: The Greatest, Terrible Book Ever Made - The Story too Disturbing to be a Movie: Blood Meridian
